title: Energy Herbal Tea N°4 Liver Detox
cleaned_text: ORGANIC 100% organic plant-based ingredients. Ingredient coming from Vietnam's forests and highland mountains areas are certified based on EU and USDA international organic standards. NATURAL Natural process with 5 NOs: No Artificial Colors, No Artificial Flavors, No Artificial Additives, No Artificial Food Preservatives, No GMOs. ENERGY Liver Detox INGREDIENT Organic vervain Organic lemongrass Organic rosemary Organic hibiscus Instruction manual Net content: 30 gram (12 bags x 2.5 gram) Scan Qrcode for more information. Usage guide: Put the filter bag in 200 - 250 ml of 85-95oC water for 5 - 10 minutes then enjoy. Add more sweetness if needed Storage: Storage below 25oC. Protect from moisture and sunlight Shelf life: 2 years Do not use expired products and show signs of mold. See MFG & EXP under the paper tubes.
